page.title: 12CLUBS AND SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: THERE ARE SEVERAL COMMUNITIES AND CLUBS IN THE DALE. PLAY GROUP IS RUN BY SEVERAL MOTHERS. IT IS HELD IN THE HALL A COUPLE OF TIMES A WEEK .JUNIORS AND SENIORS HAVE SPECIAL DO'S WHICH ARE RUN BY THE YOUTH CLUB OR CHILDRENS TREAT .THE BADMINTON CLUB IS ALSO HELD IN THE HALL ONCE WEEKLY .BUT THE TEAM ALSO GOES TO OTHER PARTS OF CUMBRIA TO COMPETE AGAIST OTHER CLUBS .THE TENNIS CLUB IS QUITE LUCKY BECAUSE IN PATTERDLE THERE IS A TENNIS COURT SO THEY CAN PRACTICE EVERY DAY .THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES CONNECTED WITH THE CHURCH AT PATTERDALE .GLENNRIDDING AND PATTERDALE ALSO HAVE A PARISH COUNCIL. ITS MEMBERS ARE SUPPOSED TO LOOK AFTER THE COMMUNITY. THE PARISH COUNCILLORS ARE ELECTED TO SERVE ON THE COUNCIL FOR A TERM OF FOUR OR FIVE YEARS.
